verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> Now it came to pass in the seventh בָּ֣א <WH935> with him came יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> [that] Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָ֣ה <WH5418> of Nethaniah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֱלִישָׁמָ֣ע <WH476> of Elishama מִזֶּ֣רַע <WH2233> of the seed הַ֠מְּלוּכָה <WH4410> royal וְרַבֵּ֨י <WH7227> and the princes הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king וַעֲשָׂרָ֨ה <WH6235> even ten אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH376> men אִתּ֛וֹ <WH854> for אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <WH1436> unto Gedaliah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָ֖ם <WH296> of Ahikam הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <WH4709> to Mizpah וַיֹּ֨אכְלוּ <WH398> and there they did eat שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there לֶ֛חֶם <WH3899> bread יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> together בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> Mizpah

וַיָּקָם֩ <WH6965> Then arose יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <WH3458> Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָ֜ה <WH5418> of Nethaniah וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> and the ten הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים ׀ <WH376> men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> for וַ֠יַּכּוּ <WH5221> that were with him and smote אֶת־ <WH853> גְּדַלְיָ֨הוּ <WH1436> Gedaliah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָ֧ם <WH296> of Ahikam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָ֛ן <WH8227> of Shaphan בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> with the sword וַיָּ֣מֶת <WH4191> and slew אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom הִפְקִ֥יד <WH6485> had made governor מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> him whom the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> over the land

וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיְּהוּדִ֗ים <WH3064> all the Jews אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הָי֨וּ <WH1961> become אִתּ֤וֹ <WH854> for אֶת־ <WH854> with גְּדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH1436> that were with him [even] with Gedaliah בַּמִּצְפָּ֔ה <WH4709> at Mizpah וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <WH3778> and the Chaldeans אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who נִמְצְאוּ־ <WH4672> that were found שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there אֵ֚ת <WH853> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> there [and] the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> of war הִכָּ֖ה <WH5221> also slew יִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <WH3458> Ishmael

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> happened בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <WH8145> And it came to pass the second לְהָמִ֣ית <WH4191> after he had slain אֶת־ <WH853> גְּדַלְיָ֑הוּ <WH1436> Gedaliah וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> and no man לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יָדָֽע׃ <WH3045> knew

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> That there came אֲ֠נָשִׁים <WH376> men מִשְּׁכֶ֞ם <WH7927> from Shechem מִשִּׁל֤וֹ <WH7887> from Shiloh וּמִשֹּֽׁמְרוֹן֙ <WH8111> and from Samaria שְׁמֹנִ֣ים <WH8084> [even] fourscore אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men מְגֻלְּחֵ֥י <WH1548> shaven זָקָ֛ן <WH2206> having their beards וּקְרֻעֵ֥י <WH7167> rent בְגָדִ֖ים <WH899> and their clothes וּמִתְגֹּֽדְדִ֑ים <WH1413> and having cut וּמִנְחָ֤ה <WH4503> themselves with offerings וּלְבוֹנָה֙ <WH3828> and incense בְּיָדָ֔ם <WH3027> in their hand לְהָבִ֖יא <WH935> to bring בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> [them] to the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַ֠יֵּצֵא <WH3318> went forth יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <WH3458> And Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָ֤ה <WH5418> of Nethaniah לִקְרָאתָם֙ <WH7125> to meet מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמִּצְפָּ֔ה <WH4709> from Mizpah הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> all along הָלֹ֖ךְ <WH1980> as he went וּבֹכֶ֑ה <WH1058> them weeping וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become כִּפְגֹ֣שׁ <WH6298> and it came to pass as he met אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> them he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to בֹּ֖אוּ <WH935> unto them Come אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <WH1436> to Gedaliah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָֽם׃ <WH296> of Ahikam ס

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> turned כְּבוֹאָ֖ם <WH935> And it was [so] when they came אֶל־ <WH413> about תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> into the midst הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> of the city וַיִּשְׁחָטֵ֞ם <WH7819> slew יִשְׁמָעֵ֤אל <WH3458> that Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָה֙ <WH5418> of Nethaniah אֶל־ <WH413> about תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> them [and cast them] into the midst הַבּ֔וֹר <WH953> of the pit ה֖וּא <WH1931> he וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH376> and the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> But

וַעֲשָׂרָ֨ה <WH6235> But ten אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH376> men נִמְצְאוּ־ <WH4672> were found בָ֗ם וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> among them that said אֶל־ <WH413> to יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <WH3458> unto Ishmael אַל־ <WH408> not תְּמִתֵ֔נוּ <WH4191> Slay כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> us not for we have לָ֤נוּ מַטְמֹנִים֙ <WH4301> treasures בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> in the field חִטִּ֥ים <WH2406> of wheat וּשְׂעֹרִ֖ים <WH8184> and of barley וְשֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> and of oil וּדְבָ֑שׁ <WH1706> and of honey וַיֶּחְדַּ֕ל <WH2308> So he forbare וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not הֱמִיתָ֖ם <WH4191> and slew בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> them not among אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH251> their brethren

וְהַבּ֗וֹר <WH953> Now the pit אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom הִשְׁלִ֨יךְ <WH7993> had cast שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> in it יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <WH3458> wherein Ishmael אֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all פִּגְרֵ֣י <WH6297> all the dead bodies הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH376> of the men אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom הִכָּה֙ <WH5221> whom he had slain בְּיַד־ <WH3027> because גְּדַלְיָ֔הוּ <WH1436> of Gedaliah ה֗וּא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> had made הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אָסָ֔א <WH609> [was] it which Asa מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> for fear בַּעְשָׁ֣א <WH1201> of Baasha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> מִלֵּ֛א <WH4390> filled יִשְׁמָעֵ֥אל <WH3458> [and] Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָ֖הוּ <WH5418> of Nethaniah חֲלָלִֽים׃ <WH2491> it with [them that were] slain

וַיִּ֣שְׁבְּ ׀ <WH7617> carried away captive יִ֠שְׁמָעֵאל <WH3458> Then Ishmael אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׁאֵרִ֨ית <WH7611> all the residue הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> of the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בַּמִּצְפָּ֗ה <WH4709> that [were] in Mizpah אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנ֤וֹת <WH1323> daughters הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> [even] the king's וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and all the people הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים <WH7604> that remained בַּמִּצְפָּ֔ה <WH4709> in Mizpah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom הִפְקִ֗יד <WH6485> had committed נְבֽוּזַרְאֲדָן֙ <WH5018> whom Nebuzaradan רַב־ <WH7227> the captain טַבָּחִ֔ים <WH2876> of the guard אֶת־ <WH853> גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH1436> to Gedaliah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָ֑ם <WH296> of Ahikam וַיִּשְׁבֵּם֙ <WH7617> carried them away captive יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> and Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָ֔ה <WH5418> of Nethaniah וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <WH1980> and proceeded לַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> to go over אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon ס

וַיִּשְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> that [were] with him heard יוֹחָנָ֣ן <WH3110> But when Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <WH7143> of Kareah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <WH2428> of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for אֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָֽרָעָה֙ <WH7451> of all the evil אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> had done יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <WH3458> that Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָֽה׃ <WH5418> of Nethaniah

וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> Then they took אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> the men וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <WH1980> and went לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> to fight עִם־ <WH5973> with יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> with Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָ֑ה <WH5418> of Nethaniah וַיִּמְצְא֣וּ <WH4672> and found אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about מַ֥יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> him by the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is in בְּגִבְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1391> that [are] in Gibeon

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כִּרְא֤וֹת <WH7200> saw כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> Now it came to pass [that] when all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אֶת־ <WH854> were with יִשְׁמָעֵ֔אל <WH3458> which [were] with Ishmael אֶת־ <WH853> יֽוֹחָנָן֙ <WH3110> Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <WH7143> of Kareah וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <WH2428> of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for וַיִּשְׂמָֽחוּ׃ <WH8055> that [were] with him then they were glad

וַיָּסֹ֙בּוּ֙ <WH5437> cast about כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> So all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom שָׁבָ֥ה <WH7617> had carried away captive יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <WH3458> that Ishmael מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <WH4709> from Mizpah וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> and returned וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <WH1980> and went אֶל־ <WH413> unto יֽוֹחָנָ֖ן <WH3110> unto Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קָרֵֽחַ׃ <WH7143> of Kareah

וְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> But Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָ֗ה <WH5418> of Nethaniah נִמְלַט֙ <WH4422> escaped בִּשְׁמֹנָ֣ה <WH8083> with eight אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> men מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> from יֽוֹחָנָ֑ן <WH3110> Johanan וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> and went אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon ס

וַיִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> Then took יוֹחָנָ֨ן <WH3110> Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קָרֵ֜חַ <WH7143> of Kareah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all שָׂרֵ֧י <WH8269> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֣ים <WH2428> of the forces אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> for אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׁאֵרִ֤ית <WH7611> that [were] with him all the remnant הָעָם֙ <WH5971> of the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom הֵ֠שִׁיב <WH7725> whom he had recovered מֵאֵ֨ת <WH853> יִשְׁמָעֵ֤אל <WH3458> from Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָה֙ <WH5418> of Nethaniah מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמִּצְפָּ֔ה <WH4709> from Mizpah אַחַ֣ר <WH310> after הִכָּ֔ה <WH5221> [that] he had slain אֶת־ <WH853> גְּדַלְיָ֖ה <WH1436> Gedaliah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָ֑ם <WH296> of Ahikam גְּבָרִ֞ים <WH1397> [even] mighty אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> of war וְנָשִׁ֤ים <WH802> and the women וְטַף֙ <WH2945> and the children וְסָ֣רִסִ֔ים <WH5631> and the eunuchs אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הֵשִׁ֖יב <WH7725> whom he had brought again מִגִּבְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1391> from Gibeon

וַיֵּלְכ֗וּ <WH1980> went וַיֵּֽשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> and dwelt in בְּגֵר֣וּת <WH1628> the habitation [כְמֹוהֶם כ] (כִּמְהָ֔ם ק) אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> which is by בֵּ֣ית לָ֑חֶם <WH1035> Bethlehem לָלֶ֖כֶת <WH1980> went לָב֥וֹא <WH935> to enter מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> into Egypt

מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> Because הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans כִּ֥י <WH3588> since יָרְא֖וּ <WH3372> for they were afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> accept כִּֽי־ <WH3588> since הִכָּ֞ה <WH5221> had slain יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> of them because Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְתַנְיָ֗ה <WH5418> of Nethaniah אֶת־ <WH853> גְּדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH1436> Gedaliah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיקָ֔ם <WH296> of Ahikam אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom הִפְקִ֥יד <WH6485> made governor מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> whom the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land ס
